resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158395</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158395</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1007</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Conflict</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cuberschneidung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conflit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conflito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conflitto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγκρουση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conflicto</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this project learners are taught to examine a conflict, learn more about it and then express their opinion about that conflict in a letter to the editor of a newspaper.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prejustice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">customs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">traditions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Projekt werden Anfänger unterrichtet, 
eine $überschneidung zu überprüfen, mehr über sie erlernen und 
ausdrücken dann ihre Meinung über diese $überschneidung in einem 
Leserbrief einer Zeitung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans ce projet des étudiants sont enseignés à 
examiner un conflit, apprennent plus à son sujet et puis expriment 
leur avis au sujet de ce conflit en lettre à l'éditeur d'un journal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste projeto os learners são ensinados examinar 
um conflito, aprendem mais sobre ele e expressam então sua opinião 
sobre esse conflito em uma letra ao editor de um jornal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo progetto principianti sono insegnati 
esaminare un conflitto, gli imparano più ed allora esprimono il loro 
parere circa quel conflitto in una lettera all'editore di un giornale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το πρόγραμμα οι αρχάριοι διδάσκονται για να 
εξετάσουν μια σύγκρουση, να μάθουν περισσότερους για το και να 
εκφράσουν έπειτα την άποψή τους για εκείνη την σύγκρουση σε μια 
επιστολή στον επεξεργαστή μιας εφημερίδας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este proyecto enseñan a examinar un conflicto, 
aprenden más sobre él y después expresan los principiantes su 
opinión sobre ese conflicto en una carta al editor de un periódico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">prejustice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewohnheiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Traditionen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kommunikation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">prejustice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">coutumes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traditions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">prejustice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">costumes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tradições</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uma comunicação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prejustice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abitudini</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tradizioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comunicazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">prejustice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τελωνείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παραδόσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επικοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">prejustice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">costumbres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tradiciones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comunicación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>

            </role>

version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education

        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1007</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

version:3.0

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>

          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          <context>

          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>427</id>

        </classification>
        <classification>

            <source>purposeValues</source>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            <taxon>

              </entry>
            </taxon>

    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
